channel.title: Playbooks on Elon Society of Computing
channel.description: Recent content in Playbooks on Elon Society of Computing

item.title: Onboarding
item.description: Welcome to Elon Society of Computing 1.1 Mission Elon Society for Computing strives to connect, support, and serve Elon students that are passionate about computer science. We are committed to continuously learn, innovate, and serve our community. 1.2 Values Commitment We are dedicated to ESC’s mission and projects. Members will regularly attend club/team meetings, deliver quality work, and consistently meet target deadlines. We embody professionalism to produce our best quality work.
